data.name: MEET HUNTER
data.detailed_description:
** Game Features**
It can control dual-role games, open the 3D world, free perspective, game set survival and adventure, collection and cultivation, exploration, combat, copy and other play methods. The game is a seamless world with 16 square kilometers of scenes, including desert islands, rainforests, volcanoes, basins, deserts, grasslands, flower seas, streams, snow mountains, caves, cemeteries, chaotic stones, withered trees, castles, tribes and so on, with all kinds of weather alternating day and night. Low-end machines can play games.

** Game Play **
The protagonist and pet have the highest level of 25, and the protagonist has the highest fighting power of 5211314. When you meet your partner after Level 3, you can manipulate two male and female roles at the same time, and the role equipment can be shared. Each character has 12 skills (including long-range and short-range Ice Fire Control Target Scope Return and Blood Evasion, etc.) In order to better attack effect, they can freely collocate skills. The game can upgrade skills and weapons, and all equipment can be acquired and synthesized in combat. In addition, we can collect, hunt, provide a variety of pets in the game, grow up by feeding pets, participate in battle can be upgraded... In addition, there are 12 different levels of caves in the scene, two hell caves, can go to brush equipment, in addition, there are 62 pairs of small couples in the scene and other people found.

** Game Story**
With the continuous development of human science in the future, human beings have mastered mysterious knowledge, including magic. But a full-scale nuclear war almost destroyed the civilization of the earth. What is more serious is that nuclear pollution makes it impossible for human beings to survive. In order to prevent the recurrence of war and the continuation of human beings, almost all weapons have been destroyed and contaminated buildings and other objects buried. People began to have faith, build temples, and sleep, hoping to spend the long nuclear winter through dormancy, and continue human civilization... After a few years there was no human activity, the world was embraced by forests, flowers and plants, but the nuclear-contaminated animals became extremely terrible, they began to attack the human dormancy, people wake up from the dormancy one after another... When the protagonist woke up, he The child had woken up early and was transported to a safe shelter by guards. In order to find the lost children, the protagonist embarks on a dangerous journey alone, to find his own children, and meet his family.

data.short_description: An independent single game. The game's enclave is very small, the game is open to the world, Sandbox games. Players can explore freely on a large map, and can manipulate a pair of male and female characters to fight at the same time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Pentium(R)Dual-Core CPU 2.93GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX650
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Pentium(R)Dual-Core CPU 2.93GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750
  • Storage: 250 GB available space
